1) This years kids’ activities include: 
2) Arts and Crafts 
3) Drumming Circle 
4) Street art workshops (spray painting) 
5) Face painting 
6) Soccer skills 
7) Music and songwriting workshops (kids should bring instruments if they have them!) 
8) Puppet shows 
9) Kids’ yoga and movement (please bring your own yoga mat!) 
10) Giant drum 
11) Upcycling furniture 
12) Circus skills 
13) Kids’ disco 
14) Games 
15) Dance workshops 
16) Storytelling 
17) Bouncy castles 

and much more!


Please note: the children’s area is not a crèche and children should not be left unsupervised. Parents must stay with their children at all times.


Children under 3 have free entry to Vantastival. 3-13 year olds cost €5 (for a day or weekend ticket). Tickets for children cannot be purchased in advance and must be paid for at the box office.
